data.title: Early Mid Round Barrier Mesh
data.description: Deny Attackers from taking Mid space easily with this Barrier Mesh lineup. However, they may run up Tube.

data.title: Yellow + B Plant Sonic Sensors
data.description: Make it extremely difficult for Attackers to take space and look for an early spike plant with these Sonic Sensors.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Grav Net
data.description: Early into the round, throw this Gravnet to set up an aggressive play towards A Main. You can also use this to combo utility for a potential pick.

data.title: Double A Site Sonic Sensor Hold
data.description: Prevent Attackers from taking the A Site easily with these placement of Sonic Sensors.
